content:
I'll create a new report based on the execution logs provided.

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System at (41, -85)
- Burner mining drill mining coal
- Burner inserter at (42.5, -83.5) moving coal to storage
- Wooden chest at (43.5, -83.5) storing coal (295 units)
System is working properly and self-sufficient

### Iron Production System 1 at (-20, -54)
- Burner mining drill mining iron ore
- Burner inserter at (-18.5, -52.5) feeding ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-17, -52)
- Output inserter at (-16.5, -50.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest at (-16.5, -49.5) containing 139 iron plates
System is operational but drill output is currently blocked

### Iron Production System 2 at (-14, -56)
- Burner mining drill mining iron ore
- Burner inserter at (-12.5, -54.5) feeding ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-11, -54)
- Output inserter at (-10.5, -52.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest at (-10.5, -51.5) containing 143 iron plates
System is operational but drill output is currently blocked

### Iron Production System 3 at (-6, -57)
- Burner mining drill mining iron ore
- Burner inserter at (-4.5, -55.5) feeding ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-3, -56)
- Output inserter at (-2.5, -54.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest at (-2.5, -53.5) containing 52 iron plates
System is operational but drill output is currently blocked

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- When placing inserters next to entities, ensure there is enough space and no collision with existing entities
- Check for blocking items on ground before placing new entities
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting to place entities (e.g., wooden chest placement failure)

### System Blockage Issues
- Regular cleanup of blocked outputs needed for mining drills
- Implement better item flow management to prevent buildup of resources on the ground
- Consider adding more storage capacity or faster item movement when outputs get blocked

### Resource Management
- Maintain adequate fuel (coal) levels in all burner entities
- Monitor and refuel entities proactively to prevent work stoppage

NAMESPACE

Functions:
- place_entity_next_to(entity_type, reference_position, spacing, direction): Places an entity next to a reference position
  Success: When placement area is clear and correct items in inventory
  Failure: When collision detected or missing required items

Variables:
- input_inserter3: BurnerInserter
- output_chest3: Chest
- drill_status: EntityStatus
- furnace_status: EntityStatus
